name: #prv Starworks Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct the common ship hulls, weapons, and fighter LPCs from the "prv Starworks" school of design.

name: #prv Starworks Advanced Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct the advanced ship hulls, weapons, and fighter LPCs from the "prv Starworks" school of design.

name: prv Starworks Auxiliary Refit Package
desc: A data-dump of the prv Auxiliary Ship Program’s administrative files, containing - among other things - all the information needed for a spacewharf to modify common sector ships to prv specs.

name: prv Starworks Stjärngård Blueprint Package
desc: A collection of blueprints from the ”prv Starworks” school of design. The Works are well known for designing ships armed to the teeth with missiles and energy blasters.

name: prv Starworks Kratul Blueprint Package
desc: A collection of blueprints from the ”prv Starworks” school of design. The equipment all originates from Kratul Heavy Industries, a traditionalist school focused on carrier fleets and heavy ballistics.

name: prv Starworks Ryak HEL Blueprint Package
desc: A collection of blueprints from the ”prv Starworks” school of design. The schematics inside all seem to have been developed at the Ryak High-Energy Labs and suggest a sneering disdain for the laws of physics.
